Head's up pests. Getting some odd encoding errors while going from WAV to MP3 on todays (02-24) O&A. I'm not exactly sure what's going on, just to be safe I'm grabbing the replay (although the rip may actually be the issue). I'll update later this evening when I get hands-on with things. Thanks......
Does anybody have the 11-21-2008 episode where Patrice Oneal hosts the show...the torrent is here but noone is seeding it
YAY PUDDING!

Jesus, I don't know what's going on but the files are a corrupted mess. I have another 128k source on it's way (pretty slowly unfortunately) that I might be able to have posted in an hour or so, then I'll post R&F after it seeds out a bit. In the meantime I'm going to reboot my ripping rig, try another disk drive and grab the 8pm replay. Unless the 3-8 rip turns out OK but I'm not "going home with hope" as they say. As long as I figure out the snafu I'll post a true mg56 vbr 128k tomorrow morning or afternoon.

Sit tight kiddies, I'm working on it........
CBR non-mg56 128k mp3 up sooner than I thought, probably 20-30 min or so.

Alright, scratch that. The original WAV files are fine, yet get corrupted during re-code on that particular machine. Rather than up the crappy 128k and then the good one two hours later, I'm just going to use a different machine to recode them into mp3. 

It will take an hour or two to get O&A up, unfortunately - enjoy shauz's 64k in the meantime. I'm actually gonna edit R&F now and get it up first, probably up in 30 or so. 

Thanks for understanding.......
..and trust me, you don't want the cbr 128k anyway. Bigger size and more artifacting as it was encoded quickly and on the fly.
No worries while there's Olympic Hockey.  Cheers for the effort budday!
got an email to send a link to?
Thanks for all the time you put into this, must be a pain in the ass sometimes but it's appreciated.

I'm not sure why, but on a different machine going from wav to mp3 it's taking longer than it should for O&A to encode. Counter started with an hour and 30 then sometimes jumps to 2 hours and 30! Says another hour to go as of now......

I will up it as soon as I can. Also running tests right now to see if A I've fixed the issues and B can I start doing my own R&F rips. I'm editing them atm, might as well do the rip (if it doesn't affect O&A encoding) if I can. I'll start upping them at d3m0n0id too if I can make it happen.
mancation - you can mail me at mamakin56@hush.com
